==Translingual==
{{Han stroke|[[File:骨-order.gif|100px]]<br/>Box on right (Traditional Chinese and Japanese kanji)}}
{{Han stroke|[[File:骨-aorder.gif|100px]]<br/>Box on left (Simplified Chinese)}}

===Alternative forms===
There are two forms of this character (and hence derived ones): with the square in the lower left of the upper box, or with the square in the lower right of the upper box, as in the images at right.

===Etymology===
{{liushu|p}} - a [[skull]].

===Han character===
{{Han char|rn=13|rad=冂|as=04|sn=6|four=|canj=BNB}}

# [[dismember]]
# [[bone]]
# [[get]] [[cut]], [[kill]]
# ''old term for'' [[剮]]

====Usage notes====
The top section of the character turns left (◱) in PRC and Singapore, while it turns right (◲) elsewhere.

====Derived terms====
* {{l|mul|咼}}, {{l|mul|骨}}, {{l|mul|肎}}, {{l|mul|𠛰}}, {{l|mul|𠕩}}
